chat.intro: I usually feel really bad about myself and
chat.question: What's the worst part about being you?
tmi: My life is one repeating playback of all my failures.
The long dark hours spent contemplating my existence
my inability to feel confident in otherwise happy situations

chat.intro: My last relationship was really complicated,

chat.intro: I usually don't regret things, but
chat.question: What’s your biggest regret?
tmi: the one time I dropped out of school and have paid the price ever since. now I'm not living the life I want.
